translation.en: They say there are no shortcuts in life.
But I'm telling you right now, the deal I'm going to give you

translation.en: is the closest thing to free you'll ever get.
You all heard the rumors. Otherwise, you wouldn't be here.
Now's your chance to see it up close.
I give you the product for free.
Sounds too good to be true.

so get out there and sell.
You ask a lot of questions.
[woman 1] My friend is having some strange reaction right now.
[man 1] This is what I'm telling you, man, he lifted the freaking car over his head.

translation.en: [man 3] Look, I don't see no blood at all. No blood.
♪ I bet you I could spit for hours ♪
♪ But I'm pretty as a flower ♪

♪ I'm that kid This Black kid, no cowards ♪
♪ Spit it so they get it ♪
[man 2] Come on, man. There's no bird.
We shouldn't even be here right now.
-Come on, bird! -[man 2] You're not even listening.

[woman] Supply and demand. You want it or not?

translation.en: You take it, for five minutes, you get what you get.

translation.en: Instead of selling it to us, why don't you just give it to us?
translation.ko: 돈 안 받고 그냥 주는 게 어때?

translation.en: -[woman screams] Don't touch me! Get off! -[man 3] Take that stupid mask off!
Get off me! Give me my bag!
-Stop! How many has she got? -Just three.
-But I bet this chick has more. -[motorcycle revving]
Gentlemen, on your knees, hands behind your head.

translation.en: I see we have a lady here, as well. You too, ma'am.

translation.en: You sure you want to do that, young man?
You ever taken one of those before?
You haven't, have you? I can tell.
Now, I bet you've heard it can make you fast, make you strong.
Make this a fair fight, even though I got a gun pointed at your face.
But that's only if you happen to have a good Power.
translation.ko: 근데 그건 네 능력이 괜찮을 때 얘기고

translation.en: Some people take it and just blow up.
-I don't wanna do this anymore, man. -Shut up.
So the question is, what's your power?
Might be good, might be bad, nobody knows.
You boys are lucky I only have one pair of cuffs.
translation.ko: 수갑이 하나밖에 없는 걸 감사히 여겨라

translation.en: That is not what I saw.
So what, you practice that in the mirror?
I bet you had your gun out too.
Pointed at yourself, talking all hard like you Clint Eastwood.
translation.ko: 클린트 이스트우드인 척 자기 얼굴에 으름장 놓으면서?

translation.en: -[woman] The Bridges of Madison County. -That's actually a pretty good one.
[woman] By the way, it's 500 for that pill in your pocket.
The same stuff as last time?
-Yeah, what else it gonna be? -I don't know.
Did you get it from the same guy as last time?
Come on, you either gonna be a cop or a customer.
to take out whole precincts of cops single-handed.
I'm just trying to level the playing field.
-What do you think of the bike? -It's an all right bike.
Well, you want it or not?
-I mean, I brought it here for you. -You lying.
No, you said it was your birthday the other day, right?
-That was a month ago. -Okay then, you know what? Never mind.

I have a caller on the line. Tell me exactly what you saw.

[DJ] Bruh, it sounds like you might have been on something.

a kid jumped straight off the roof of the casino and just walked away.
translation.ko: 어떤 애가 카지노 지붕에서 뛰어내린 다음 멀쩡히 걷더라고요

translation.en: [DJ] Maybe there's a little conspiracy going--
[Newt] I ain't ask who you're looking for, I said, "Who is it?"
translation.ko: 누구 찾아왔냐고 물은 게 아니라 누구냐고 물었는데

He sent me here to talk to you. Maybe you wanna do some business.
translation.ko: 사이먼이 가보랬어요 거래에 관심 보이실지 모른대서

translation.en: [Newt] Come where I can see you.
I got a box in my hands.
You wanna see my hands, or put the box down?
Put the box down and get your hands up.
-Okay, I'm with you. Box down. -[Newt] Yeah, just...
If you want, you can call Simon. He'll verify who I am.
Tell him that the Major's here to see you.
I'ma go make that call. You stay right there.
Just need some information, that's all.
Tell me where you're getting this stuff, and I'll get out of here.
translation.ko: 약 출처만 말해 그럼 고이 나가줄게

translation.en: All you gotta do is tell me who your supplier is.
So what you think about that, Newt, huh? We got a deal?
you can slither back to whatever hole that you came out of, understand?
translation.ko: 살던 시궁창에 다시 처박히든 말든 맘대로 해

translation.en: -Get the hell out of my kitchen! -[Newt snarling]
[woman] Newt, you gonna get somebody killed in here!
Where you getting this shit from? Who's making it? Tell me the source!
translation.ko: 약 어디서 났어? 누가 만들었어? 누구한테 샀는지 말해!

translation.en: [man] Tell me right now! Who's the supplier?
-I'ma go pick some up later. -[TV chattering]
The initial investigation is indicating a home meth lab,

translation.en: but we're gonna wait until we see the full report

Isn't that where Newt hangs out?
Uh, I'm not sure, could be.
Text your cousin for me, baby.

with your prescription and your soup tonight.
This is a major problem during pregnancy
Birth defects caused by drinking alcohol and using drugs while pregnant.

translation.en: How do we prevent these birth defects?
I'm guessing that you're discussing what the condition is called

translation.en: How do we prevent these birth defects?
Simple. It is the only form known as FAS...
I know that you don't think this stuff is serious,

translation.en: you don't think it's important, but it is.
Right now, you're getting a D in this class, Robin.
So since you don't seem to be worried about your grades or graduating...

translation.en: you must have a plan, right?
So what is that plan, Miss Reilly?
Well, then, why don't you get up and rap for us?
Make me believe that you've got a shot,
and I'll give you a C for the year.
♪ Now what's the difference Between a student and a teacher? ♪
♪ While one of them is growing up The other's getting weaker ♪

♪ Stalking the halls In squeaky little shoes ♪ ♪ Get you some sneakers ♪

♪ Get a wife, get a mint ♪

♪ It don't love nobody like me ♪

translation.en: You can give me that phone
or you can go to the office.
Let's get back to prevention, please.
There is no magic pill to fix it.
[man on radio] Reports of armed robbery downtown near the Savings bank.

translation.en: Sir, what'd you see in there?
I don't know, I didn't see him.
It's like I was hit by a ghost.
[man] This is not right, man, you gotta...
You can't just get-- Not now, Landry. Not now.
You can't just come and take my shit over.
Armed robber, multiple hostages, the negotiator can't make contact.
translation.ko: 무장 강도, 인질 다수 협상 접근도 실패

translation.en: Pretty sure our scene just became theirs.
You weren't down here ten minutes ago. What is this? What do we do?
translation.ko: 10분 전만 해도 없었으면서 갑자기 왜 이러냐고요?

translation.en: This is wrong. I'm gonna remember that. I'm gonna remember that.
We've been asked to stand down.
We're here in support now only.
Frank, this is some bullshit, man.
Like, if it was up to me...
The bags! The bags! Follow the bags!
[man on radio] All units set up a perimeter.
[Frank] Hey! Hey! Out of the way! Out of the way!
Get out of the way! Go! Go!
[woman] Scale of one to ten, ten being the worst, what's your pain right now?
-It doesn't hurt. -[woman] Any soreness in here?
-For a second, I did there. -[bells chime]
Look at my finger. Follow it.
Can you excuse us for a minute?
Did you take a pill today?
Put your gun and the badge on the table.
Gun and badge on the table, now.
If I hadn't taken that, I'd be dead.
-That what you want? -I want my police force to obey the law!
translation.ko: - 죽었으면 좋겠어요? - 법을 좀 따르면 좋겠다!

translation.en: There are no laws on this drug!
They don't exist officially, 'cause every time we try to deal with it,
translation.ko: 우리가 해결하려고 들면 정장 입은 놈들이 물러나라고 해서

translation.en: some guys in suits show up and tell us to stop.
Look, I don't know who those two were that came in today
and cut you off at the knees.
I don't know if they're feds or military or what,
translation.ko: 연방 정부 사람인지 군대 쪽 사람인지 모르지만

translation.en: but clearly, they have you under their thumb.
And I don't think you like it.
'Cause they don't care about the people of this city.
translation.ko: 저놈들은 도시 안전 같은 거 쥐뿔도 관심 없어요

translation.en: Not like you do, not like I do,
and we know what happened last time we were counting on guys in suits
to look out for New Orleans.
Now, you need to make me the bad guy, that's fine.
But I'd be willing to bet you know more than you're allowed to say.
translation.ko: 말씀하시는 것보다 많이 알고 계신 거 맞죠?

translation.en: Maybe we can work together on this, unofficially.
And maybe we can do some good.
[man on radio] Captain, suspect is currently being removed from the premises.
[Captain] Anybody finds you with that, you didn't get it from me.
I'm told he's the source of Power.
We shut him down, we get our city back.
-You need anything else? -[man] No, I'm fine.
So, can I get you anything?
-I'll take some of that. -Yeah. Okay, I'll get that for you.
Can I get some hot water?
Say, you saw who did this?
No, I just came out the door.
[Robin's voice] It's Robin. You know what to do.
I need to re-up, so meet me in the usual spot.
translation.ko: 약이 떨어져서 그러는데 늘 보던 데서 봐

translation.en: [Robin] Let me out! Please, let me out!
You keep kicking around in there.
This how we gonna do this.
All that kicking ain't making no sense.
You in a strange man's car in an even stranger place.
translation.ko: 낯선 사람 차에 갇혀 더 낯선 곳에 왔으니까

translation.en: But I need to have a conversation with you.
-I need to be able to look-- -[Robin screams] I need to be able to look you in your eye.
maybe I need to make a trip over to 32 Park, right?
Well, if I let you out and you start crying,
I'ma pay a little visit to Irene.
Make sure she all right, huh?
I take it you love Irene 'cause you ain't knocking no more.
translation.ko: 조용해진 걸 보니 아이린을 사랑하나 보네

translation.en: So when I open this up,
[man] Why don't we start from the beginning, make it simple?
-Huh? -I'm Robin! Oh, I can't hear you.
You push that Power, don't you?
I don't know nothing about that--
Maybe you'll figure it out, huh? You stay in there until you figure it out.
translation.ko: 잘 생각하면 기억날 텐데? 기억날 때까지 갇혀 있어

translation.en: -Maybe you know something about Newt. -I don't-- I don't know--
-Oh, you don't know who Newt is? -No.
[man] That's funny because Newt be all in your phone.
I get weird texts from people all the time because that's what the job is.
translation.ko: 일 때문에 모르는 사람한테 문자 많이 와요

translation.en: Well, let me tell you what's even more weird.
So since Newt ain't here, that leads us to... where to, huh?
Where to, Robin? I need to know where the source is.
So you can advance your position in life.
-Hmm? Look closer, is that Biggie? -I don't know.
Oh, you on these streets, you don't know shit.
I know you're feeling like fight or flight,
but I'ma tell you right now, you just breathe and get through it
because listen, you don't know who I am and what I'm about,
translation.ko: 내가 누군지, 뭘 하는 사람인지 넌 모르겠지만

translation.en: but I got to find that source.
I need to get to the top of the food chain.
But you keep messing around with me and acting like you don't know shit,
translation.ko: 근데 아무것도 모른다면서 계속 개소리나 하면

translation.en: I'm gonna knock your ass out, and then I'm gonna go kill your mother.
translation.ko: 너랑 네 엄마, 둘 다 가만 안 둬

translation.en: She's connected to every cartel in South America.
translation.ko: 남아메리카 카르텔은 죄다 저 여자랑 연줄이 있어

translation.en: Then our backers will see what the rest of us have already seen.
That we're working for the woman who's gonna change the world.
translation.ko: 우릴 이끄는 여자가 세상을 바꿀 거란 사실

translation.en: Welcome. I see you packed light.
if the product lives up to its reputation.
It is not just a product.
You're about to become the most powerful woman in South America.
In that case, I look forward to your demonstration.
Hey, I see what you doin'.
You do what I told you.
I was told to call this number if I ever had a problem.
translation.ko: 문제가 생기면 이 번호로 연락하라고 들어서요

translation.en: [man] Go to Hong Kong Market off of Patterson.
Go to the back and ask for alligator wine.
[man] You're gonna go meet whoever's in there,
you're gonna tell them what we talked about.
You're gonna tell them that you saw me and that I left.
translation.ko: 내 얼굴을 봤고 나는 가버렸다고 해

translation.en: No, you said point you in a direction, that's a direction.
translation.ko: 어떻게 할지만 알려달라면서요 왜 날 시켜요?

translation.en: You ever hear of a mine rat?
-It sound like a rat that get blown up. -Well, that's what you are.
Look, I was just trying to make ends meet. I'm just a kid, I'm--
translation.ko: 돈이 필요해서 그랬어요 전 그냥 애고...

translation.en: I know what you trying to do!
You out here in these streets dealing, you ain't no damn kid.
translation.ko: 마약 거래나 하고 다니는데 네가 무슨 애야?

translation.en: You can't keep playing that whole "I'm just a child" card, okay?
Excuse me, could you help me out with this?
-Is it spicy, is it mild? -I don't know what the fuck it is.
Okay, why don't you have a seat?
Yeah, he gave it to me in case something went wrong.
translation.ko: 네, 무슨 일 생기면 연락하라고 받았어요

translation.en: Then he threw me in his trunk.
This is the safest place for you right now.
Biggie works in sales. This is distribution.
I don't want to talk to any middle men. Already did that.
translation.ko: 유통업자랑은 할 말 없어 이미 얘기해 봤으니까

translation.en: You don't tell me where Biggie is, I'll cut your fucking head off.
translation.ko: 비기가 어디 있는지 안 불면 목 날아갈 줄 알아

translation.en: Don't worry, okay? I'm gonna come--
It's so good to see you.
They're logging Powers. There's chips in every capsule.
The government won't let them test it, so they test it on us.
translation.ko: 정부에서 실험 허가를 안 내주니까 우릴 대상으로 삼았군

translation.en: The people that you're selling to,
[man] It's a demonstration for potential buyers.
translation.ko: "오늘 밤: 시연" 잠재 구매자를 위한 시연

translation.en: It means they're done with New Orleans. It means I'm running out of time.
He ODed. I didn't kill him.
translation.ko: 과다 복용이었어 내가 죽인 거 아니야

translation.en: I'm just trying-- I'm just trying to find my daughter.
Yo, you need to calm down.
You fell out, I brought you to the vet. My mom work here.
translation.ko: 기절했길래 엄마가 일하시는 동물 병원에 데려온 거예요

translation.en: But now I need to finish the exit wound.
translation.ko: 총알 나간 상처 마저 꿰매야 해요

translation.en: You gonna let me do it or not?
I didn't even do nothing yet.
[woman] There a lot of girls that look just like her!
[man] Mrs. Reilly, do you want your daughter to end up dead?
translation.ko: 라일리 씨, 설마 따님이 죽길 바라시는 건 아니죠?

translation.en: I already told you, I don't know where she is.
She was supposed to be home hours ago. What...
translation.ko: 몇 시간 전에 왔어야 했는데 도대체...

translation.en: With all due respect, officer, there's a lot of girls--
[man] This could get very ugly for your daughter
-and for you. -[woman] Are you sure it was her?
Are you sure you're not mistaken?
[man] Are you sure you haven't seen this man before?
translation.ko: 진짜 이런 남자 본 적 없으세요?

translation.en: [woman] No, I told you I don't know what you talking about.
We have surveillance footage of your daughter with this man tonight
translation.ko: 따님이 이 남자와 함께 오늘 밤 여기서 8km 떨어진 데서

translation.en: committing crimes about five miles from here.
This could get a whole lot uglier for you.
Honey, bear. Are we all out of that one hippie shampoo that--
Whoa! What the shit's going on here? Who the hell are you guys?
What you doing in my bathroom?
-[man] We're the police. Who are you? -Man, I live here.
Babe, I'm sorry I was in your shower. The pressure's so much better in yours.
translation.ko: 자기 방 욕실 써서 미안해 거기 수압이 훨씬 세서

translation.en: I'm really sorry it had to happen that way.
Let me just handle these guys, okay?
What precinct did you guys say you're from?
Sir, Mrs. Reilly and her daughter
seem to be the only residents registered to this address.
So now because I'm not in your little database, I can't...
translation.ko: 잘난 데이터베이스에 내가 등록이 안 돼 있다고...

translation.en: I thought you said you lived here.
Is that so hard to believe? Why?
Are you assuming that me and this beautiful Black woman
wouldn't be able to share a happy home?
You wanna say that on camera?
All right. Well, let's just see about this.
-And we are live streaming. -[phone beeps] Now, let's just get this on record.
Honey, did either of these men show you a warrant
translation.ko: 자기야, 이 사람들이 집 들어오기 전에

translation.en: when they came into our house?
Uh-huh. And did either of them show you a badge?
No! Can I see your badges?
Thank you for your time, Mrs. Reilly.
[woman] I'm sorry, do I know you?
My name is Detective Frank Shaver, NOPD.
Well, I don't have it on me.
Mrs. Reilly, your daughter and I have had a professional friendship
translation.ko: 라일리 씨, 따님이랑 저는 일적으로 아는 사이입니다

translation.en: for a little over half a year now.
She's a very smart and good-hearted young person,
translation.ko: 애 머리가 좋고 마음 착한 건 알지만

translation.en: but she is mixed up in some things she shouldn't be,
and I am trying to help her.
Thank you. I'm gonna need this too.
Come on. You ain't tried it?

translation.ko: 과다 복용한 애를 본 적 있어요

translation.en: they're talking about how it'll give you superpowers,
but not about how one hit could kill you.
translation.ko: 한 알 먹고 죽을 수 있단 얘긴 안 하죠

translation.en: why you still in the game?
What happened to getting good grades and staying in school?
translation.ko: 성실히 학교 다니면서 좋은 점수 받아야지

translation.en: Yo, I wish I could get good grades.
Go to school, get to college, get some fancy-ass job.
translation.ko: 대학 나와서 잘난 직업 갖고 싶다고요

translation.en: Well, my mother has diabetes now.
And we don't got no health insurance.
And she needs surgery, the expensive kind, so what else am I supposed to do?
translation.ko: 비싼 수술을 받아야 한다고요 약 안 팔고 배겨요?

translation.en: -What, it don't trip you up killing fools? -Yeah, it tripped me up.
But that was my skill set.
And what did the system do? It took advantage of me.
translation.ko: 이 사회는 그런 날 이용해 먹었어

translation.en: But I know now I got to work the system harder than it's working me.
translation.ko: 하지만 나는 그 이상으로 사회를 이용할 줄 알아

translation.en: You're young, you're Black, you're a woman.
The system is designed to swallow you whole.
You gotta find out what you do better than anybody else and rock that.
So what you gonna do? Hmm?
How you gonna leave your mark?
I'm sorry. Well, what's your rap name then, huh?
What you gonna be, the next Cardi B?
Well, go ahead and spit then.
You say you rap, let me hear one line.
Huh? You can't spit one line?
I don't like doing it in front of people.
How you gonna to be a rapper if you got stage fright?
translation.ko: 무대 공포증이 있는데 어떻게 래퍼가 되냐?

translation.en: You know what I think? Most time, people don't wanna do something
translation.ko: 내 생각에 사람들이 뭘 하기 싫어하는 이유는

translation.en: is 'cause they're probably just wack at it.
If you wack, just say you wack.
Give you a word? What you talking about?
[Robin] I'm gonna go off the top, give me a word.
♪ And every single accolade for spitting 'Bout to be mine ♪
♪ I'ma go from old shit and goodwill To design ♪
♪ I'ma be rocking Dior like Dion I'm Celine ♪
translation.ko: 꽉 물어, 어금니 이제 나는 악바리

translation.en: ♪ Can someone tell them other boys A real MC is coming, no humming ♪
translation.ko: 원하는 놈들은 올라와, 스테이지 한번 붙어봐, 매치

translation.en: ♪ My name already chose a different bird ♪
♪ I killed your lil freestyle Give me another word ♪
translation.ko: 내 따발총에 넌 파김치 다음 단어 던져보시지

translation.en: ♪ Dude trying to trip me up With his seismograph ♪
translation.ko: 단어 달라니까 지진계? 나 짜증 나게 만들게?

translation.en: ♪ I think it's funny I can't pick a better time to laugh ♪
translation.ko: 난 이어가, 뻔뻔스레 네 눈은 휘둥그레

translation.en: ♪ You don't know all the rhymes I have ♪
♪ The only thing that don't sit well Within this mind ♪
translation.ko: 이 몸이 못하는 거 딱 하나 있다면

translation.en: ♪ I might need an anti-psychotic I'm going crazy ♪
translation.ko: 폭약으로 가득한 내 머릴 위한 묘약

translation.en: ♪ NOLA made me And this flow, I got it ♪
♪ I been about it Even if my mental space is crowded ♪
translation.ko: 꼼짝달싹 못 해도 나는 계속해, 창작

translation.en: ♪ I keep it in because a guilty dog Gonna bark the loudest ♪
translation.ko: 원래 죄지은 놈이 제일 크게 발작

translation.en: ♪ My mom's the proudest I know that we can make it out if ♪
translation.ko: 난 우리 엄마 인생의 낙 아무리 힘들어도

translation.en: ♪ We made it through a flood I bet we gonna get through the drought ♪
♪ I may be little, but in these waters you won't catch me drowning ♪
translation.ko: 키는 작아도 절대로 안 죽어, 꼴까닥

translation.en: ♪ One day I'll swim in all them Dollar bills I'ma be counting ♪
translation.ko: 대작으로 발칵 뒤집을 테니 기대해, 내 음악

translation.en: You take that, you leverage that,
you use your power to take the system down.
You gotta take four of them.
Yeah, well, you a big dog.
♪ 'Bout to make a million For all my, all my, all my ♪
♪ Better watch your back I'm a maniac... ♪
He took something from me. I gotta get it back.
I could navigate for you. You're going to where the dots on the screen is.
translation.ko: 제가 길 알려줄게요 지도에 있던 점으로 갈 거잖아요

translation.en: Why the hell would I pay you $10,000 for anything?
Medical expenses, keeping your ass alive, kidnapping fee.
translation.ko: 치료 비용, 목숨 살려준 비용 납치한 대가

translation.en: I'd say I done you a lot of solids here.
So, this is your daughter, Tracy.
And you think that guy with the beard took her?
translation.ko: 그 수염 난 남자가 납치했다고 생각해요?

translation.en: They were the ones who cracked the codes back in the day.
translation.ko: 그 약 만드는 법을 알아낸 놈들이야
우리 부대원을 잔뜩 데려다 한방에 넣어두고

translation.en: put 'em all in the room, filled them up with radiation.
translation.ko: 우리 부대원을 잔뜩 데려다 한방에 넣어두고 방사능을 쪼였어

translation.en: Tried to turn us into superheroes.
'Cause in the real world, the power goes to where it always goes,
translation.ko: 현실에서 권력은 늘 한 방향으로만 흘러

translation.en: to the people that already have it.
Damn near killed me, hurt a lot of people.
translation.ko: 남들도 여럿 다치고 나도 죽을 뻔했어

translation.en: So I said I'm not trying that shit no more.
A few years later, Tracy came along.
I knew she was different though.
When she was young, she never got sick or anything like that.
As she got older, she got stronger.
But she never had to take a pill.
If you got, like, beaucoup shit in your system,
maybe it got passed down to her.
Oh, okay. Yeah, you hood, but you smart, huh?
translation.ko: 그래, 터프한 데다 아는 것도 많으시다?

translation.en: Anyway, when Teleios caught wind of Tracy,
they wanted to experiment on her like they did on me.
translation.ko: 내게 했듯이 애한테도 실험을 하려 했지

translation.en: And that's when we just took off.
-I got my seat belt on. -No, you don't. Put your seat belt on!
-[Tracy and Robin] Nobody's following us. -Hold on.
This voice, do what I tell you to do, okay?
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어 시키는 대로 해, 알았지?

translation.en: [Robin] I mean, this is the spot.
You know what? Sometimes, the plan just walk right up on you.
translation.ko: 때론 계획이 우리 앞에 알아서 나타나기도 하지

translation.en: Know what I'm saying? That's what I'm trying--
Hey, man, I'm sorry, you got a light on you, man?
translation.ko: 아, 미안해, 형씨 혹시 라이터 있으신가?

translation.en: -[man] Watch it. -[Art, slurring] No, be nice.
translation.ko: - 잘 보고 다녀 - 그럴 건 없잖아

translation.en: You gonna act like that, huh?
Your girl got you feeling good? She look good, man.
translation.ko: 예쁜 여자 끼고 있어서 허세 부리시나?

translation.en: -Stuck-up guy with a gun. -With a gun.
Man, they definitely ain't gonna cash no checks, you heard?
translation.ko: 수표 바꾸러 가는 것 같진 않은데요

translation.en: All right, that's all I need.
I thought we was like Batman and Robin.
We ain't Batman and Robin, that's a movie, this is real life.
translation.ko: 배트맨과 로빈은 무슨 이건 영화가 아니라 현실이야

translation.en: Man, I got your blood on me.
You just hang here and wait till I get back, all right?
translation.ko: 나 돌아올 때까지 여기서 기다려, 알았냐?

translation.en: [slurring] Man, glad to be in here.
-Oh, man! What's up, man? -Can I help you?
-[man] Man, look. -[Art] It's me. Ain't you Nico?
I ain't no Nico, this a private party.
No. You got the wrong spot, man.
No, I know I got the right spot.
[man] You're not on this list, man. It's a private party. You got to roll out.
Yeah, that's my name right there.
Over the last months, we've been going from city to city
translation.ko: 저희는 지난 수개월간 여러 도시를 전전하며

translation.en: in a kind of a... let's call them clinical trials.
and we move on quickly to avoid unwanted oversight.
translation.ko: 대상 구역을 작게 잡고 빠르게 변경해 왔죠

translation.en: The next evolution of the human species.
With your financing, Teleios could become the most powerful company in the world.
translation.ko: 투자만 해주시면 텔레이오스는 곧 세계 1위 회사가 되겠죠

translation.en: Power to level the playing field.
Or, if you like, destroy it entirely.
One day, you won't even need a pill.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 약을 먹을 필요도 사라질 겁니다

translation.en: Sure. Let me tell you about my friend the little lizard.
translation.ko: 그럼요 우리 꼬마 친구 도마뱀에 대해 얘기해 볼까요?

translation.en: A healer who can stitch himself up and even regrow what he lost.
translation.ko: 심한 상처도 스스로 치유하고 잘린 사지도 복구하죠

translation.en: Hands, feet, eyes, unfathomably complex structures.
translation.ko: 손, 발, 눈 아무리 복잡한 구조라도요

translation.en: The octopus camouflages herself against the sea floor.
translation.ko: 문어는 해저에서 몸 색깔을 바꿔 숨습니다

translation.en: The wolverine frog breaks its own bones to use as weapons.
translation.ko: 울버린개구리는 자기 뼈를 부러뜨려 무기로 쓰기까지 하죠

translation.en: They see in the dark, they dislocate their bones.
translation.ko: 야간 시야가 뛰어나고 마음대로 탈구를 하며

translation.en: They punch, they strangle, they thermoregulate.
translation.ko: 강력한 앞발, 목조르기에 체온 조절도 자유자재죠

translation.en: Evolution has given animals countless abilities we can only dream of.
translation.ko: 동물은 진화를 통해 우리가 꿈도 못 꿀 능력을 손에 넣었죠

translation.en: All the genetic potential hidden in our DNA
translation.ko: 우리 DNA 속에 그 잠재력이 숨어 있는 겁니다

translation.en: one day, a pill that lasts forever.
translation.ko: 약 한 알로 몸을 영원히 바꿀 수 있습니다

translation.en: But as we work to a compound that we fully control,
translation.ko: 하지만 완전 통제가 가능한 약물을 만들 때까지는

translation.en: Looking for you. Your mom is worried sick.
Listen, don't bullshit me right now.
Why is he a bad guy? Because he's done some bad things?
translation.ko: 왜 악당인데요? 나쁜 짓 좀 했다고?

translation.en: What about you? You do bad things too!
That is almost a good point, but the bad things that I have done--
He's just looking for his daughter.
Everything he's doing, he's doing it for her.
-That sound like a bad guy to you? -That's what he told you?
Look, I'm sorry that you miss your dad,
-but he's telling you a story-- -Don't do me like that--
translation.ko: - 이놈 말은 다 거짓말이야 - 그런 거 아니에요

translation.en: He's not here looking for his daughter. He's setting up shop.
translation.ko: 자기 딸 찾는 게 아니라 약 팔려는 거라고

translation.en: -You think he's the source of Power? -Yes!
Well, he's not. He's trying to stop it.
Uh-huh. Okay. If that's true, and by the way, I don't think it is,
translation.ko: 정말 그렇다면... 내가 보기엔 절대 아니지만

translation.en: but if it is, then he should be helping me.
translation.ko: 진짜로 그런 거면 저 인간도 날 도와야지

translation.en: If it's not true, then he's lying to you and he's dangerous
and I need to bring him in. Either way, you should tell me where he is.
translation.ko: 체포하든 협력하든 해야 하니까 어디 있는지 빨리 말해

translation.en: [man] Ladies, gentlemen, the moment you've traveled so far to see.
-What's gonna happen to me? -[man] Don't worry.
[whispers] They have one at the CIA.
You're about to witness a very rare power.
This one can get a bit intense.
[man] Let's make sure she stays comfortable.
There's people on this list I don't think should be here.
translation.ko: 오면 안 되는 사람들이 와 있는 것 같아요

translation.en: You're gonna take two steps to the left. Look at me.
translation.ko: 왼쪽으로 두 걸음 가, 어딜 봐?

translation.en: You're gonna walk out of that elevator, I'ma be right behind you.
translation.ko: 엘리베이터에서 내려 내가 뒤에 붙어 갈 거야

translation.en: Please. I'm about to sell 100,000 pills.
translation.ko: 지금 약 10만 개 팔아 치울 참인데

translation.en: -Let me finish this sale. -No, we ain't got time for that.
-[woman] Get down! -[man] Don't come closer. Just do what he says.
translation.ko: - 꼼짝 마! - 가까이 오지 마, 이놈 말대로 해

translation.en: Tell him put it down. Talk to him.
You don't, I'll make a mess of him right now.
You can have him. We're just gonna take the pills.
translation.ko: 그놈은 맘대로 해 우린 약만 가져갈 테니까

translation.en: [man] Fine, take the pills. We can work it out.
Hey! Put the case down now!
[screaming] Get me out! Get me out! Get me out!
[Art, muffled] Where is she? Where's my daughter?
Whatever you want. Pills, money, anything.
translation.ko: 약이든 돈이든 원하는 대로 다 가져가

translation.en: I don't want no frickin' pills.
Who is this, and where do I find them?
-Just... please, no need for this-- -Huh? No?
I bet you know now, huh?
The whole operation's on a boat called the Genesis.
Is that where my daughter is?
Is she on the boat? Tell me where my daughter is!
translation.ko: 내 딸 거기 있냐고? 애 어디 숨겼는지 말해!

translation.en: -Put the gun down, now! -I can't do that, chief.
translation.ko: - 총 당장 내려놔! - 못 합니다, 경관님

translation.en: All right, gun down, hands up. Boss, you running everything.
translation.ko: 총 내리고 손 들었어요 시키는 대로 합니다

translation.en: -Just know I got a little hitch here. -I don't care!
translation.ko: - 문제가 있어서 이래요 - 알 바 아냐!

translation.en: I understand you don't care, but I gotta care.
I'm just letting you know I'm complying, okay?
You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and will be used--
translation.ko: 묵비권을 행사할 수 있고 모든 발언은 법정에서...

translation.en: Robin told me to tell you something.
She said every moment comes with invisible decisions.
translation.ko: 매 순간은 보이지 않는 선택과 같다고

translation.en: She told me to tell you about mine rats and seismographs...
translation.ko: 무슨 지뢰 탐지용 쥐랑 지진계 얘기를 전해달라던데

translation.en: Man it was long. It was about decisions,
translation.ko: 길어서 기억이 안 나 선택이 어쩌고저쩌고...

translation.en: but in the end she said, "Am I lying?"
-[Art] What the hell are you doing here? -[Robin] I got worried.
[Art] Go, go, go! Get her out of here!
-[Robin] Frank, we gotta help him. -[Frank] You already did help him.
You brought him here. Are you not paying attention?
translation.ko: 여기까지 데려와 놓곤 아까 못 들었어?

translation.en: At least he's being honest about it.
Come on. Art, tell him what you told me.
-No, come on, please, you can't give up. -I said...
Do I look like your daddy or something?
-Down in the basement! -[Robin] You gotta help him.
He'll never find his daughter if you arrest him.
Well, you're both a bunch of cowards!
[Captain] You've reached the voicemail of Captain Craine
of the New Orleans Police Department. Please leave a mess--
I'm bringing him in. Call me back.
translation.ko: 서장님, 그놈 잡았어요 데리고 갑니다 연락 주세요

translation.en: Uh-huh. Let me guess, you're one of the good drug dealers, right?
You're trying to save the world.
Listen, it ain't too late for you to walk away.
You're the one in handcuffs, and I'm literally in the driver's seat,
translation.ko: 수갑 찬 건 너고 운전대 쥔 건 난데?

translation.en: in the next 30 seconds, your captain is gonna call you
and tell you to take me to a different place, not the precinct.
translation.ko: 경찰서가 아니라 다른 데로 가라고 할 테니까

translation.en: But we're never gonna make it to that place.
And then your captain sends out a single cop
translation.ko: 도시에서 제일 위험한 놈 잡는 데

translation.en: to apprehend the most dangerous man in the city. Why?
translation.ko: 서장은 왜 달랑 너 하나 보냈을까? 왜?

translation.en: Because he's taking orders from someone else.
And I can also tell you that that van over there...
They gonna kill you, and then they gonna take me.
translation.ko: 놈들은 널 죽이고 날 데려갈 거야

translation.en: Now, I'm okay with that second part of this
if it gets me to my daughter sooner.
-What are they doing here? -Doing field testing.
translation.ko: - 놈들은 뭐 하는 거지? - 현장 실험

translation.en: If they can stabilize it, then they'll mass produce it.
So whatever's happening here is gonna start happening everywhere.
translation.ko: 곧 전 세계가 이 꼴이 난다 이거야

translation.en: And what? Your kid has something to do with it?
Where do you think they got the formula from?
They think they can just test their shit on the people of New Orleans
and no one's gonna care, no one's gonna fight them on it?
Well, let 'em see what happens. What do you need?
translation.ko: 아니란 걸 보여주지 필요한 게 뭐냐고

translation.en: You still got them pills on you?
[man on radio] What happened to the cop?
[woman on radio] Get the Major to A deck.
I want all personnel and cargo loaded ASAP.
translation.ko: 사람이랑 물건 전부 최대한 빨리 실어

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here? I told you--
You scared me half to death, almost gave me a heart attack!
-Those men have guns-- -Don't be barking orders at me--
translation.ko: - 저놈들 총 갖고 있어! - 명령하지 마요

translation.en: -You not my daddy-- -We're not having this conversation.
translation.ko: - 우리 아빠도 아니면서 - 이럴 때가 아니야

translation.en: No, it was his plan. It's the only way he can get to his daughter.
translation.ko: 아니, 아트 계획이야 그래야만 딸을 찾는대

translation.en: -Now I gotta bust in after him. -So what are we gonna do about it?
Put this in your ear and you tell me about what's coming and what's going.
translation.ko: 이거 귀에 꽂고 주변 상황 나한테 전부 보고해

translation.en: You got a few guards with guns right in front of you.
translation.ko: 앞에 총 든 놈이 몇 명 있네요

translation.en: I think you should do the Clint Eastwood thing.
-I'm not doing the Clint Eastwood thing. -[high-pitched whirring]
-I got a meeting upstairs. -[guard] Stay right there.
You know who I am, right? NOLA dock authority.
translation.ko: 나 누군진 알지? 뉴올리언스 항구 직원이야

translation.en: You know I don't care, right?
translation.ko: 내 알 바 아닌 것도 알겠네?

translation.en: You heard of a harbor master? That's my boss.
Now, if your boss doesn't give my boss ten thousand dollars,
translation.ko: 너희 상사가 그분한테 1만 달러 안 주면

translation.en: -I guess that vessel's not going anywhere. -[Robin] He's not down, Frank.
translation.ko: 그럼 출항 못 하는 거지, 뭐 소용없어요, 프랭크

translation.en: I think maybe you gotta go with the Clint Eastwood thing.
Come on, like you practiced in the mirror.
Well, I guess you just gotta ask yourself one question.
Am I gonna be the guy that makes a bad decision
to send the bag man home empty-handed,
make the boss get out of bed,
start raining hellfire on whoever's responsible?
Or am I gonna be the guy who makes a good decision
and get the hell out of the goddamn way,
so we can all get home in time to watch the Saints highlights?
translation.ko: 그래야 다들 오늘 밤 경기 하이라이트 방송 시간에 맞춰 가지

translation.en: [guard] Hey, I got an answer for you.
[man on radio] Let's get him outta here.
[woman] I know you think what we're doing here is wrong,
translation.ko: 우리 일 나쁘게 생각하는 거 알아

translation.en: but do you know the name Henrietta Lacks?
Henrietta Lacks checks into a hospital in 1951
to have a tumor removed from her cervix,
but the doctor doesn't just take the tumor,
he also takes healthy cells in the process.
[Robin] Frank. Wait, can you hear me?
[woman] Those cells, stolen without her consent,
are the backbone of nearly every medical advancement
translation.ko: 지난 한 세기 동안 의학 발전에

translation.en: All because someone took one look at that woman
We're talking about permanent power, the next step in human evolution.
translation.ko: 영원한 능력 유지가 가능해 인류의 진화 그 자체야

translation.en: All of our greatest advancements began in darkness, Major.
translation.ko: 위대한 진보란 원래 어둠 속에서 시작되거든

translation.en: It's up to the pioneers to light the way.
[Art] Well, you see, that's the thing, Doc.
How about you take your science project
-and you shove it up your mother-- -[zapping]
Salvage whatever genetic material you can and flush the rest.
No, you're supposed to be the lookout.
All the checkpoints got their own security doors.
translation.ko: 모든 중요 지점에 보안 문이 달려 있어요

translation.en: And if I press those two buttons, the whole thing go on lockdown mode.
translation.ko: 이 버튼 2개는 누르면 시설 전체가 잠겨요

translation.en: So you're saying you can open and close doors for me.
translation.ko: 네가 문 여닫아 줄 수 있단 거지?

translation.en: You get in any trouble, you run. You meet me at the front of the ship.
translation.ko: 걸릴 거 같으면 도망쳐 배 앞쪽에서 보자

translation.en: If I can get there, I will. If I can't, then you keep running.
translation.ko: 나도 가도록 최선을 다할게 나 없더라도 도망쳐

translation.en: But there's like a thousand guards out there.
But you know I'm awesome, right?
It's about to get real noisy.
Got eyes on him right now.
[woman] Get to ops, find out why this alarm is going off.
translation.ko: 보안실로 가서 왜 경보음 울리는지 확인해

translation.en: All right, where am I going now?
There's another door at the other end, to the left, down the stairs.
translation.ko: 복도 끝에 문 하나 있어요 왼쪽으로 가서 계단 내려가요

translation.en: -That big dude's coming this way. -[Frank] Which way?
-How quickly can you get us out of here? -About 15 minutes until we can release
translation.ko: - 출항 최대한 당기면 언제야? - 항구 출발까지 - 15분은 걸립니다 - 10분 안에 해

translation.en: -Down the stairs, last door to the right. -[Frank] Copy that.
translation.ko: - 내려가서 오른쪽 제일 끝 문요 - 좋아

translation.en: Heading down to sub level two.
Frank, I think I found her.
translation.ko: 프랭크, 그 애 찾은 거 같아요

translation.en: [Robin, broken audio] Frank, I know where she is.
[Frank] You're breaking up. What'd you say you found?
[Frank, broken audio] I can't hear you, Robin.
-What did you say? You found what? -[Robin] Can you hear me?
Frank, look out, there's someone behind you!
Just get him to the door, Frank.
That's the sound of the most advanced tactical team in the world
translation.ko: 세계 최고의 전술 팀이 이 배를 완전히

translation.en: Frank, punch him in the nuts or something.
[Robin] Come on, Frank. It's time to be awesome.
[woman] Wallace, what the hell is going on down there?
[woman] You get back to the Major.
Well, then get us out to sea.
[Art] Let me ask you something, big man.
What's the most powerful animal on the planet?
translation.ko: 지구에서 제일 센 동물이 뭐 같아?

translation.en: [Art] Some people think it's the lion 'cause, you know, they big,
translation.ko: 다들 사자라고 생각하지 덩치도 크고 하니까

translation.en: but hit you so fast, it vaporizes the water around it.
translation.ko: 얼마나 빠르게 때리는지 주변 물이 증발하지

translation.en: Eight thousand degrees hotter than the surface of the sun.
rips the flesh right off the bone.
it's just Mr. Shrimp sitting there, eating...
We get all these powers from animals, right?
translation.ko: 파워 먹으면 생기는 능력은 다 동물 거잖아?

translation.en: Hey! What the hell are you doing?
Get the fuck out of here!
I was a little disappointed we took you without a fight.
Got a lot of dead friends because of you.
That's disgusting, by the way. Come on.
I gotta get you out of here.
I gotta bring you to him.
[woman] All right, I'm gonna check the other room.
I want you on the deck now. It's the only way
-she can get off this damn ship. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
[woman] All security personnel should be on full alert.
The asset is missing. Multiple intruders. I want a full sweep of the ship.
translation.ko: 실험체 실종에 침입자 다수 배 전체를 수색해라

translation.en: -[Art] Was that Robin I heard? -Yeah, she's in the control room.
translation.ko: - 아까 로빈 목소리야? - 응, 보안실에 있어

translation.en: I think she knows where Tracy is.
All right, we gotta get to the bow.
I told her anything goes wrong, meet at the front of the boat.
translation.ko: 일이 잘못되면 배 앞쪽으로 오라고 했는데

translation.en: Let's get you out of here. Come on.
How much time we got left?
Less than five, more than zero.
-Still got your pill? -Yeah, I'm saving that one.
translation.ko: - 약 있어? - 하나 있는데 안 쓸 거야

translation.en: -All right, we're gonna run. Ready? -[watch beeps]
Stay with me. Go, go, go!
[Frank] Come on! Your dad's right behind us.
translation.ko: 얼른! 너희 아빠는 바로 뒤에서 쫓아오고 있어

translation.en: You see who I have here?
[woman] I want Tracy out here now!
-Give me the pill. -[Art] It's not gonna work on you.

translation.ko: - 내가 해야 해 - 안 돼요, 아빠

translation.en: -You know what'll happen if you do that. -I will kill her, Arthur, right now,
translation.ko: - 어떻게 되는지 알잖아요 - 아트, 지금 죽인다

translation.en: I love you more than anything in the world, you hear me?
translation.ko: 아빠가 세상 무엇보다도 널 사랑하는 거 알지?

translation.en: I love you, but there's no way we're leaving her behind.
translation.ko: 사랑한다, 하지만 저 앨 두고 갈 순 없어

translation.en: [woman] All of you out of the boat, now!
you drop this boat down and get out of here, okay?
I want Tracy out here now!
-Robin, you all right? -Don't talk to her!
translation.ko: - 로빈, 괜찮니? - 애한테 말 걸지 마

translation.en: [Art] Let me tell you something, Robin.
You let her go, I let you live.
I told you what was gonna happen, didn't I?
Tracy, do you think you could heal a gunshot wound?
Who dat say they gon' beat dem Saints?
Man, it went down in the Dome last night.
It was even louder on the streets.
Did y'all hear about the two explosions last night after the game?
translation.ko: 경기 끝나고 폭발 2건이 있었는데 소식 들으셨어요?

translation.en: The Coast Guard's saying they can't find any sign of the ship,
translation.ko: 해안경비대 보고로는 배 흔적을 찾을 수가 없으며

translation.en: and then, NOPD has absolutely nothing to say about it.
[Frank] Well, first I think I'll have a long talk with my captain
translation.ko: 우선 서장님이랑 심각한 얘기 좀 하고

translation.en: then maybe find a journalist looking for their next big story.
translation.ko: 어디 큰 건 노리는 기자 없나 찾아봐야지

translation.en: [Art] You blow that whistle, ain't no going back.
translation.ko: 내부 고발을 하면 돌이킬 수 없을 텐데

translation.en: Well, let's see these assholes try to hide when everyone knows what they're doing.
translation.ko: 만천하에 정체가 알려지면 어떻게 꽁무니를 뺄지 구경하자고

translation.en: You think this is really over?
Make sure you check the trunk.
There's something great inside you, Robin.
translation.ko: 넌 굉장한 걸 품고 있는 사람이야

translation.en: Why you got my mama's phone, man?
translation.ko: 왜 우리 엄마 휴대폰을 갖고 있어요?

translation.en: [male DJ] Man, I am about to beat on your eardrums with this one.
translation.ko: 여러분께 꼭 소개하고 싶은 대단한 곡이 있어요
신인 래퍼 MC 로빈 라일리의 첫 싱글입니다

translation.en: from brand new MC Robin Reilly, featuring Chika.
translation.ko: 신인 래퍼 MC 로빈 라일리의 첫 싱글입니다 치카가 피처링했습니다 들어보시죠!
